About Me

Let me introduce myself

BIO

I'm a computer engineer graduate from the University of Guadalajara , actual residence city. I have software development and programing skills.Like to solve problems. Im dependable and like teamwork. Like to learn new things, passionate for science and technology. Some of my hobbies : Music, Videogames, Animation, Astrophysics. These are my three most recent job positions:
